I'm having some problem installing the program!

Have put the crack in the "sony setup" map in C/programs and made short cut to the desktop. Can't open the applications with the short cut though. "vegas80k.dll" can't be found...

What should i do?

To those with this problem: "vegas80k.dll" can't be found... If you are running Windows 7 you might want to try checking what directory you installed vegas to. I found that by default it was being installed to programs x86, and was giving me that error message. Try moving the whole Sony folder into the regular programs folder, and then run the crack from there, and it should start up saying "expires in 0 days." hope this helps.
